subject: Please respond to your loan application
body:
Dear Homeowner

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. Act NOW to receive your pre-approved loan.

You can receive $262,000 for 
$670 per month.

Please respond Today.
http://ilook.tw/g8ah

 


Efrain Wiley 
American Home Loans


Every generation laughs at the old fashions, but follows religiously the new.	-Henry David Thoreau (1817-1862)
